Player History
Had first career hit on 4/5/1985, off Dan Schatzeder (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/8/1985, off Lee Smith (CHC)...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 2/4/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Released by San Diego on 8/27/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/17/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Released by Los Angeles on 6/24/1987...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 2/17/1988 to a 1-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Injured on 9/21/1988 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/3/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $1,100,000 per year...
Traded from Los Angeles to Boston on 5/3/1989 (Going to LAD: P Dan Plesac. Going to BOS: P Bob James, 2B Glenn Hubbard)...
Released by Boston on 6/18/1989...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 8/14/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $456,000 per year...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/14/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $1,575,000 per year...
